head.name: TAN keywords for types of bitext relations
head.desc: List of standardized terms used for types of bitext relations.

item.name: unclear
unclear relation
item.desc: The relationship between one source text and the other is unclear.

item.name: a/b
item.desc: direct unmediated descent, B descends from A

item.name: b/a
item.desc: direct unmediated descent, A descends from B

item.name: x}y,x//a,y//b
item.desc: A and B directly descend from X and Y, respectively, where Y is a major alteration (e.g., translation, paraphrase, adaptation) of X.

item.name: x}y,x//b,y//a
item.desc: B and A directly descend from X and Y, respectively, where Y is a major alteration (e.g., translation, paraphrase, adaptation) of X.

item.name: a/x/b|b/x/a
item.desc: direct descent, unknown direction, one mediary

item.name: a/x/b
item.desc: direct descent, B descends from A, one mediary

item.name: b/x/a
item.desc: direct relationship, A descends from B, one mediary

item.name: a/x+/b|b/x+/a
item.desc: direct descent, unknown direction, one or more mediaries

item.name: a/x+/b
item.desc: direct descent, B descends from A, one or more mediaries

item.name: b/x+/a
item.desc: direct relationship, A descends from B, one or more mediaries

item.name: /a,/x/b
item.desc: parent of A is grandparent of B

item.name: /b,/x/a
item.desc: parent of B is grandparent of A

item.name: /x/a,/x/b
item.desc: A and B have a common grandparent

item.name: /a,/x*/b
item.desc: parent of A is ancestor of B

item.name: /x*/a,/b
item.desc: parent of B is ancestor of A
